summary: AN ORDINANCE, relating to City employment, to be known as the Fourth Quarter 2001 Salary Ordinance, establishing new titles and/or salaries in various departments; designating three positions to titles exempt from civil service in various City departments; designating a position in the Transportation department as exempt from civil service and amending the Seattle Municipal Code (S.M.C.) 4.13.010; all by a 2/3 vote of the Council.
